name: [LD 50] Don't be flat !
description:
My entry for the extra Ludum Dare 50 !

Try to go further possible while avoid rocks in generated levels !

Miss some time to polish game. Leak of balancing too.

But I hope you will like it  anyway ;-)

I made it in solo, with Godot Engine.

If you see bug, don't hesitate to report it here: https://github.com/Natahan-Tatan/LD50-Don-t-be-flat/issues. Thanks !

Rules:

Join the portal on the top-right corner of the level.

  • Space: jump
  • Arrows/ A D: move
  • Escape: pause
